What is Joaquin feeling right now?

 

You've just told Joaquin he has to fill out the new revised form to submit his request, and that you're not going to be able to accept the old outdated form he completed this morning.

 

Joaquin's usually an easygoing guy, so you're surprised when he puts his hands on his temples, rubs them, and sighs.  

 

Directions:  Click on each button to see how you can boost your empathy and make a connection with Joaquin.

The Emotional Balcony

Your response?  How does what Joaquin's feeling make you feel?

Hear the whole person.  What's the context?  You know Joaquin is working on several projects right now, all with tight deadlines.  You also know he's dealing with the recent death of a parent.   Remember, don't judge.

Although his words are polite, there's a bit of an edge in Joaquin's voice.  What clue does Joaquin's tone of voice give you about his feelings?

What's is Joaquin's affect/overall expression of emotion?

What is Joaquin's posture telling you?  Is he unhappy?  Overwhelmed?  

What does his facial expression tell you?  Is he frustrated? Confused?  

Is Joaquin making eye contact with you? Maybe you should give him a minute.  How can you let him know that you see him?
